title: Customer_360
description: Customer data from various sources, enabling a holistic view of customers.

table.title: customers
table.description: Contains customer information, including customer_index, name, contact details, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Customer wrokflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing customer data

table.title: clickstream
table.description: Contains clickstream information, including sessionid, clientid, prodcut details, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Clickstream wrokflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing clickstream data

table.title: order_line_item
table.description: Contains order line item information, including orderid, order datetime, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: order_line_item workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing order_line_item data

table.title: product_details
table.description: Contains products detailed information, including sku_id, product_category, model_name, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: product_details wrokflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing products_details data

lens.name: Customer Insights Lens
lens.description: Provides insights into customer behavior and preferences.

Compute_Cluster.Title: Compute Cluster
Compute_Cluster.Description: Utilized Apache Spark for large-scale data processing.

Apache_Kafka_Cluster.Description: Employed Apache Kafka for real-time streaming of events.

Details.Broker_Instance_Type: Instance type with at least 8 CPU cores and 32 GB RAM per broker.

PostgreSQL_Database.Description: Utilized PostgreSQL as the primary database for storing enriched data.

Details.Storage: Enough capacity to handle the 'orders_enriched_data' dataset.

Python.Title: Python
Python.Description: For data processing, transformation, and integration tasks.

Apache_Kafka.Title: Apache Kafka
Apache_Kafka.Description: To enable real-time streaming of customer order events.

Apache_Spark.Title: Apache Spark
Apache_Spark.Description: For handling large-scale data processing efficiently.

PostgreSQL.Title: PostgreSQL
PostgreSQL.Description: As the primary database to store the enriched order data.

Customer 360 Lens.Title: Customer 360 Lens
Customer 360 Lens.Description: Empowers businesses with comprehensive customer insights.

Features.Recency Frequency and Monitoring (RFM) A: Employs RFM analysis to understand customer behavior and tailor marketing strategies effectively.

Recency.Title: Recency
Recency.Description: Analyzes recent customer engagements for targeted marketing.
Recency.Usage: Identifies active customers for immediate engagement strategies.

Frequency.Title: Frequency
Frequency.Description: Analyzes customer engagement consistency for loyalty programs.
Frequency.Usage: Identifies highly engaged customers for retention strategies.

Monitoring.Title: Monitoring
Monitoring.Description: Continuously tracks customer transactions for revenue optimization.
Monitoring.Usage: Identifies high-value customers for personalized strategies.

Customer.Description: Attributes related to customer information for analysis.

ZIP code associated with the customer's address

Product Views.Description: Attributes related to product viewing activities for analysis.

Attributes.Description: Session identifier of the activity event
Unique identifier of the activity event

Items Added to Favorite.Description: Attributes related to favorited items by customers for analysis.

Items Added to Cart.Description: Attributes related to items added to cart by customers for analysis.

Order Placed.Description: Attributes related to orders placed by customers for analysis.

Segment.Title: Segment
Segment.Description: Attributes related to customer segmentation for targeted marketing.

GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Title: Governance Policies and Stewardship
GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Description: Establishing policies and roles for effective data governance and stewardship.

AccessControl.RoleBasedAccess: Granting access based on roles to maintain data security.
AccessControl.DiscretionaryAccess: Implementing discretionary access control and masking PII for privacy.

StewardResponsibilities.Title: Steward Responsibilities
StewardResponsibilities.Description: Defining roles and responsibilities for data ownership and stewardship.
Responsibilities: Clear assignment of ownership and oversight roles.
Appointing stewards to ensure data quality and integrity.

QualityMeasuresAndStandards.Title: Quality Measures and Standards
QualityMeasuresAndStandards.Description: Ensuring high-quality data through rigorous measures and adherence to standards.
QualityMeasuresAndStandards.Approach: Comprehensive assessment across dimensions such as accuracy, completeness, timeliness, consistency, and uniqueness.
QualityMeasuresAndStandards.AuditsAndFeedback: Regular audits and feedback mechanisms to continuously enhance data quality.

CleansingAndPreprocessing.Title: Cleansing and Preprocessing
CleansingAndPreprocessing.Description: Thorough cleaning and preprocessing procedures to ensure data integrity.
Processes: Addressing missing values, outliers, and inconsistencies.
Standardization, normalization, and duplicate record elimination.
Transforming and aggregating data for coherence.
Utilizing advanced algorithms for imputation and encoding.

BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Title: Personalized Marketing Campaigns
BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Description: Analyze customer preferences and behavior to tailor marketing campaigns for increased engagement and conversion rates.

BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Title: Customer Segmentation
BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Description: Utilize segmentation models to categorize customers based on demographics and behaviors, optimizing targeted marketing strategies.

BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Title: Churn Prediction and Retention Strategies
BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Description: Implement predictive analytics to identify at-risk customers and devise proactive retention strategies, reducing churn rates.

BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Title: Sales Performance Analysis
BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Description: Evaluate sales data to identify top-performing products, optimize pricing strategies, and enhance overall sales performance.

BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Title: Customer Satisfaction Analysis
BusinessAnalysisUseCases.Description: Analyze customer feedback and support interactions to assess satisfaction levels and improve customer service strategies.
